comments.text:
Haha,, Scooter , touching his bro on the nose , without making that ,"bop," 
noise might be ok , lol 😎😶💂 have a good night Scooter 🏈😊
comments.author: Karen Hartman

comments.text:
Hey Scooter, Can you make the I'm a Grown Man Shirt in youth sizes. My son 
is 4 and he loves to do your signature pose and say I'm a grown man. I 
would really appreciate it.
comments.author: Mistress D.

comments.text: Thx!
comments.author: Kyle Williams

comments.text:
+Avi Sinha UF is a great school! For me, I just was myself in the 
application process...too many people just try to list all their 
achievements in the essay...but why is UF a good fit for you? Be personable!
comments.author: ScooterMagruder

comments.text: +Kyle williams I didn't know that...and good suggestion!
comments.author: ScooterMagruder

comments.text: +Roberto Cordero Ohhh..I'll have to look into that
comments.author: ScooterMagruder

comments.text:
i know this is kinda random but im thinking of applying to UF and i know 
that you went there. Could you give me any tips on the application process 
and what you thought of the school when you were there? The deadline for UF 
is 11/1 and im right now choosing my top 5 or 6 colleges to apply to and 
since my dad's cousin is a professor there im thinking of applying just for 
kicks. Anyways great video! Hoping for a response from you.
comments.author: Avi Sinha

comments.text:
OK cool. Yeah, in some states, like West Virginia, won't allow you to drive 
with Glass. Although, it should be coming out early 2014, and I think 
Google Glass will be a revolutionary hit.
Maybe you should do a parody video, lol
comments.author: Kyle Williams

comments.text:
+ScooterMagruder That's what I'm trying to say. I upload my own captions 
and disable the automatic ones, and this time YouTube has re-enabled all 
the auto-captions I had previously disabled. I'm going through all of my 
videos and disabling them again. :(
comments.author: Roberto Cordero

comments.text:
+Roberto Cordero Yeah, I just disable them...but they have made it super 
easy to caption now!
comments.author: ScooterMagruder

comments.text:
+Kyle williams You can drive with it and get directions...but it doesn't 
work with an iPhone yet...and it does run by being tethered to your phone!
comments.author: ScooterMagruder

comments.text:
+ScooterMagruder Hey Scooter, I know this is off-topic but YouTube has once 
again made changes to the captioning UI and this time they have re-enabled 
the laughable-yet-depressing automatic captions in most of my videos. You 
might want to check out yours at some point.
comments.author: Roberto Cordero

comments.text:
Oh yeah, but it can still be done. BTW, do you drive with Google Glass, and 
does it run off your smartphone?
comments.author: Kyle Williams

comments.text: +Roberto Cordero I was going to respond...but then I saw the hash tag :)
comments.author: ScooterMagruder

comments.text: +Kyle williams There are so many part 1 videos that still need to be made!

comments.text:

make me extremely un-gangster or a gangster+? #RhetoricalQuestion

captions.text: What's up guys, hope you're doing well.
Top 100 Things Gangsters Don't Do.

1) Shop at Whole Foods.
2) Wear hipster glasses.

3) Floss.
4) Take selfies.

5) Hula-hoop.
6) Take selfies with others.

7) Play frisbee.
8) Take their children to school.

9) Get a pedicure.
10) Have a tea party.

11) Wear short shorts.
12) Play the recorder.

13) Get a brain freeze.
14) Read a book.

15) Fall asleep on someone's shoulder.
16) Play Pokémon on Game Boy.

17) Play Pokémon the card game.
18) Do yoga.

19) Use emojis.
20) Watch a beauty guru on YouTube.

21) Buy Go-Gurt.
22) Ask a police officer for directions.

23) Dust.
24) Do a puzzle.

25) Golf.
26) Wear socks and sandals.

27) Play lacrosse.
28) Check the stock market.

29) Vacuum.
30) Compliment another man.
You got some luscious eyelashes doe.

31) Wash dishes.
32) Make origami.
33) Have play time with the children.
You have any fours?
34) Play Go Fish.
Yeah, I actually got a four.

35) Pet a duck.
36) Cross legs in unison.
37) Bake cookies.

Ay, y'all got that chicken salad sandwich
on wheat?
38) Order a sandwich on wheat.

Umm, we carry bread. So it's not a bun, but...yeah
it's a wheat bread.

39) Fix another man's hair.
40) Play Candy Crush.

41) Change diapers.
42) Wear a night gown...

43) ...with a cat on it.
44) Play tennis.

45) Blow bubbles.
46) Wear Google Glass.

47) Blow bubbles together.
48) Eat at a salad bar.

49) Sleep with a teddy bear.
50) Wear a Cody Simpson backpack.

51) Fix another man's eyebrow.
52) Shop for organic shampoo.

53) Wear seat belts.
54) Embrace after watching Titanic.

55) Try to solve a Rubik's cube.
56) Swing on a swing set.

57) Write a love letter.
58) Have a picnic.
59) Spread the gospel.
Have you been born again?

60) Watch the WNBA...intentionally.
61) Lick an ice cream cone.
Hey Ms. Parker.

62) Meditate.
63) Recycle.

64) Play hacky sack.
65) Buy sparkling water.

66) Grow a garden.
67) Read a bedtime story.
68) Tickle each other.
Yo, yo, stop!

69) Twerk.
70) Jump rope.

71) Massage each other.
72) Salsa dance...together.
73) Play Bop It.
Twist it. Shout it.
Hey!
Bop It.
Shout it.
Hey!

74) Buy feminine products for their girlfriends.
75) Cuddle together.

76) Drink out of the same cup.
77) Play patty-cake.

78) Feed the baby.
79) Try to blow bubbles with chewing gum.

80) Drink a kid sized apple juice carton.
81) Throw a boomerang.

82) Suck on their thumb.
83) Buy breakfast tea.

84) Go down a slide.
85) Touch another man's nose.

86) Rest their foot on someone's lap/rest
both feet on someone's lap.

87) Water a plant.
88) Feed the baby again.

88) Go vegan.
89) Fan themselves.

90) Go to Starbucks.
91) Order a caramel frappuccino with extra

caramel.
92) Go to a library.

93) Play the piano.
94) Cosplay.

95) Play Dance Dance Revolution.
96) Hopscotch.

97) Wear a scarf.
98) Take a bath.
99) Wear skinny jeans.
And last but not least...
100) Do their taxes.

Leave a comment below: what number was the
funniest?
What Top 100 video should I make next?
I'm a grown man.
Y'all got salads doe?
Umm...like actual salads with lettuce?
Yeah.

Yeah, we have the Cobb salad, the Asian salad,
and the Market salad.
Let me that Grilled Market salad doe.
Ok, and what type of dressing?
Ranch.
Anything else?
That's it.
